topic_title:
Amazon Route 53 Record Set GeoLocation
      Property

variables.description: All DNS queries from the continent that you specified are routed to this                   resource record set. If you specify this property, omit the                      CountryCode and SubdivisionCode properties.
variables.name: ContinentCode
variables.required: Conditional. You must specify this or the CountryCode                   property.

variables.description: All DNS queries from the country that you specified are routed to this resource                   record set. If you specify this property, omit the ContinentCode                   property.
variables.name: CountryCode
variables.required: Conditional. You must specify this or the ContinentCode                   property.

variables.description: If you specified US for the country code, you can specify a state                   in the United States. All DNS queries from the state that you specified are routed                   to this resource record set. If you specify this property, you must specify                      US for the CountryCode and omit the                      ContinentCode property.
variables.name: SubdivisionCode
